title: Add Current Rank Display Box to Dashboard

requirements.text: Add a rank display box to the Dashboard page that shows the user's current rank label and styled rank color, mirroring the visual style and layout of the existing level display box. Use the existing `rankUtils.ts` getRank function to derive the rank from the user's current level. Place the rank box adjacent to or near the level box on the dashboard.

quotes: add a box to show just the current rank like the box that shows the level

acceptanceCriteria: A new rank box is visible on the Dashboard page alongside the level box
The rank box displays the current rank label (e.g., 'E Rank', 'D Rank', 'Shadow Monarch') derived from the user's level
The rank label text is colored using the rank color from rankUtils.ts
The rank box matches the visual style (card shape, sizing, typography) of the existing level display box
The rank box updates correctly when the user's level changes

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Reuse the existing getRank utility from frontend/src/utils/rankUtils.ts â€” do not duplicate rank logic
nonGoals: Adding rank progression details or a rank history table to the new box
